Description

台灣黑熊在台灣的山林之中日漸稀少... 他們如何維生？ 他們遇到什麼困境？ 現在跟著小黑熊的腳步，來探索他們在山林中的旅程吧 ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ *建議使用電腦瀏覽器遊玩喔！ --- Less and less Taiwan black bears in the mountains of Taiwan. How do they live? What difficult situation are they experiencing? Now follow the footsteps of the little black bears to explore their life in the mountains.ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ ---
